content.rendered:
OUR

STORY

BIRTH OF AN ICON

Founded in 1927 on the streets of New Delhi, chaiiwala® has nearly 100 years of history and tradition.

No doubt, chaiiwala® owes its humble beginnings to founder members forefathers who had one small tea stall but a great vision. They were the original pioneers of the recipes you see in store today with many people coming from afar just for a sip of their famous Karak Chaii which has now made the brand famous throughout the world and developed. cult following.

This same spirit was revived in 2016 by the family of the original founders who still draw upon their history to ensure the recipes are in keeping with the history while inspiring new, authentic menu creations fans of the brand craves.

Today chaiiwala® distinguishes itself from others by ensuring it doesn't compromise on quality and service. This ethos and commitment has allowed the business to become a brand and become one of the world’s fastest growing independent businesses with plans to grow to 500 stores across the world in the next decade.

2016

FIRST YEAR ANNIVERSARY

1927

2016

2017

2020

2021

2023

THE BIRTH OF AN ICON

Our founding father starts the Chaiiwala empire by selling his first cup of chaii on the streets of Delhi. An icon was born.

A SIP OF EAST
COMES TO UK

The next generation of the Chaiiwala family now take on their great grandfather’s special recipe and open the first SIP OF EAST with their first UK store in Leicester.

CHAIIWALA OPENS
FRANCHISING
OPPORTUNITIES

With a steady base of stores in the portfolio and interest from across the world, we developed our growth plan for the business through our tailored franchise programme

WE OPEN THE UK'S FIRST EVER DRIVE-THRU IN BOLTON

We launch the UK's first ever drive-thru serving Indian street food to a huge national fanfare

CHAIIWALA ON TRACK TO HIT 100 STORES

With new locations opening across the UK and world, the brand is on track to hit its 100 store target

CHAIIWALA OPENS FIRST INTERNATIONAL STORES

We open our first locations outside the UK with Toronto, Canada and Dubai, UAE becoming our first international sites.

1927

BIRTH OF AN ICON
